pullrequest.title: Road textures (resubmission of Tashwin's pull request #92)

content.raw:
If people use branches properly on their forks, then it is easy to pull that branch into the main repo and continue development. That is easier for me than forking their fork and submitting pull requests to them.

It is a point taken that I shouldn't create separate pull requests. I'll just leave a comment that I have added code and ask them to pull it into their branch if they approve.
content.html:
If people use branches properly on their forks, then it is easy to pull that branch into the main repo and continue development. That is easier for me than forking their fork and submitting pull requests to them.
